GPURenderBundleEncoderPushDebugGroup.summary:
The pushDebugGroup() method of the
interface begins a render bundle debug group, which is marked with a specified label, and will contain all subsequent encoded commands up until a method is invoked.

remarks.para: This could be used for telemetry, or may be utilized in messages, browser dev tools, or other services in the future to help with debugging.

blockquote.para: Note: This method is functionally identical to its equivalent on â€” .
